sen.j: 茶山駅（ちゃやまえき）は、京都市左京区にある叡山電鉄叡山本線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Chayama Station is a stop on Eizan Main Line which is operated by Eizan Electric Railway Co.,Ltd (Eiden).

sen.j: 茶山という名称は、かつてこの駅の付近にあった江戸時代の豪商「茶屋四郎次郎」の山荘に由来する。
sen.e: The name "Chayama" originates from the mountain cottage owned by Shirojiro CHAYA, a prosperous merchant in Edo Period, which was once located around the present Chayama Station.
The name "Chayama" originates from the mountain cottage owned by Shirojiro CHAYA, a prosperous merchant of the Edo period, which was once located in the vicinity of the present-day Chayama Station.

sen.j: 多客時は鞍馬線の電車に車掌が乗り込むが、出町柳駅まで乗務せずに、この駅で車掌だけ鞍馬駅行きに乗り換える姿が見られる。
sen.e: When the train running on Eiden Kurama Line has many passengers, a conductor gets on the train, and the conductor alone is seen to transfer here at Chayama Station (not at Demachiyanagi Station) from the train of Eizan Main Line to the train (bound for Kurama Station) of Kurama Line.

When a train running on the Eiden Kurama Line has many passengers, a conductor will board the train, and the conductor alone is seen to transfer here at Chayama Station (not at Demachiyanagi Station) from the train of the Eizan Main Line to the train (bound for Kurama Station) of the Kurama Line.

sen.j: 対面式2面2線のホームを持つ。
sen.e: Chayama Station has two separate platforms and two boarding areas.
sen.cmt: 「対面式2面2線のホーム」とは、「対面式（相対式）プラットホームが２つ、乗り場が2つ」の意味であり（Wiki 「プラットホーム」参照）、そこでは「プラットホーム」と「乗り場」を訳し分ける必要が生じることから、前者を"platform"、後者を"boarding area"としています。

sen.j: 宝ヶ池駅方面行きホームはホームのほぼ全体を、出町柳駅方面行きホームには約1両分の長さの上屋が設置され、ワンマンカーの乗降口をカバーしている。
sen.e: On the platform that the train bound for Takaragaike Station makes a stop, there is a shed whose length is almost the same as the platform itself, and on the platform that the train bound for Demachiyanagi Station makes a stop, there is a shed whose length is about a car of the train, so the roofs of these sheds shield passengers from the rain or the like when they get on or off the train that is operated without a conductor.
